actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the changes made by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 in the tax treatment of unemployment compensation.

summary.text: Repeals the changes made by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 which included unemployment compensation in gross income.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the changes made by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 in the tax treatment of unemployment compensation.
